ipify [![Travis-CI Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/gregce/ipify.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/gregce/ipify)
-------------

> Get your public IP

Using the [`ipify` API](https://www.ipify.org) by [Rdegges](https://github.com/rdegges)

Installation and Documentation
------------

You can install the R `ipify` package using [devtools](https://github.com/hadley/devtools):

```
library(devtools)
install_github("gregce/ipify")
```

Usage
------------

```{r}
library(ipify)
get_ip()
get_ip(format="json")
get_ip(format="jsonp")
```
